# Prompt Templates

<!-- Owner: SmartKnobCV_STM32 | Last updated: 2026-02-28 -->

Reusable prompt templates for common workflows.

## Available Prompts

No custom prompts defined yet. Add `.prompt.md` files here as needed.

## Usage

Reference prompts in Copilot Chat with `#prompt-name`.
